website_summaries.verdict: Has everything you love about the brand, including excellent craftsmanship, fashionable looks, and spacious interior. The best of the pack on all fronts.
pros: Offers a fashionable look thanks to the vanilla color, MK signature print, and brown leather trim
Comes with a detachable strap and numerous interior pockets
cons: Larger phones may not fit in the designated pocket
Not real leather, but materials and workmanship is still excellent

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: This MK Jet Set Signature Travel Wrist-let is exactly as shown on the listing. The color is a soft vanilla with light brown trim, the MK original price tag is still attached, as well as the MK care booklet. It was sealed in the original plastic bag and comes with a detachable wrist strap. The inside has several slots for cards, a zipper pocket for change, a section for currency, and several other slots and sections for storing. Very satisfied with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Lady

customer_reviews.title: Not convinced this is authentic Michael Kors
customer_reviews.text: There are bubbles on the hardware! I wouldn’t expect that from authentic Michael Kors. Kind of hard to get a good picture of the bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: brittney camp

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, matched well with my MK bag.. the texture the color it was perfect

customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my daughter wanted for her birthday. Great price! A bit larger than her current wristlet. Perfect!

customer_reviews.title: It's very misleading! It stated it was large and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very misleading! It stated it was large and had several compartments! I literally broke a nail trying to remove credit cards out of the slots! Extremely tight Fit!

product_meta.title: Michael Kors Women's Jet Set Continental Wallet
product_meta.description: A versatile MICHAEL Michael Kors zip wallet in saffiano leather. The lined interior has 16 card slots, 4 cash pockets, a zip compartment, and an ID window. Optional wrist strap.
feature_bullets: Signature MK print coated twill with gold-tone hardware
Interior: 3 Open Compartments, Zip Compartment, 2 Slit Pockets, Window Pocket
